title: Expected value of sum of numbers on tags

content.question: A box contains 10 tags, numbered 1 through 10, with a different number on each tag. A second box contains 8 tags, numbered 20 through 27, with a different number on each tag. One tag is drawn at random from each box. What is the expected value of the sum of the numbers on the two selected tags?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

topic.text: 4.8: Mean and Standard Deviation of Random Variables

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
